infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Unknown_X: A mysterious heavy machine gun modified by Nue’s unknown factors, firing bullets with varied effects. Unstable components may damage the weapon; requires fuel rods for stabilization. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Unknown Bullet Shards or Heavy MG Mag‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Unknown_X_Ammo: Behold this special barrage. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Unknown X‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Instant_Blue01: An enigmatic future weapon of unknown origin, needing further refinement. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Instant Blue Chip or SMG Mag‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Instant_Blue02: A well-crafted future weapon from a distant era of Earth, combining incomprehensible magical circuits with advanced tech. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Instant Blue Chip or SMG Mag‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Instant_Blue: ‖color:44,156,216,255‖After a 53-minute journey across a blue sea, it finally arrived.‖end‖ Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Instant Blue Chip‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Instant_Blue_Am: A chip that stores memories of the sea, functioning purely to activate the ‖color:44,156,216,255‖Instant Blue‖end‖ magic circuit (‖color:gui.yellow‖cannot be recharged‖end‖). Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Instant Blue‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Merciless: The Destroyer symbolizes death and ruin; without it, there is peace. When mod activated, projectile speed becomes infinite and damage increases. Modification energy equals remaining durability; full energy required. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Heart of Merciless‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Corrupted_Merci: Every world teems with suffering souls yearning for release. On activation, doubles magazine size and refills ammo on kill. Modification energy equals remaining durability; full energy required. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Heart of Corrupted Merciless‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Merciless_Ammo: A bark-like heart cold to the touch, devoid of warmth. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Merciless‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Corrupted_Merci: The heart of Merciless tainted by fear and malice, seemingly no longer of this world. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Corrupted Merciless‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Magic_Crystal_E: A special mineral discovered on Europa, with magical currents inside. Can be refined into alchemy materials and further processed with by-products at an alchemy table.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Labyrinth: Whether for immortality or wealth, alchemists always keep a weapon handy. Each shot strengthens its magic circuits, boosting performance. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Simple Circuit or Precision Circuit‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Labyrinth_Ammo0: A basic magic circuit providing sustained but mild firepower. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Labyrinth‖end‖.
An intricate magic circuit of immense power and wilder fire. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Labyrinth‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Mental_Metal: All things have an origin; beyond origin lies spirit.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Corrupted_Weapo: Unsettling text describing methods for crafting Corrupted weapons. Reading unlocks the ritual table recipes.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Monorail: A weapon from the other side of a black hole, bearing a civilization’s future and a lifeform’s past.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Monorail_Ammo: The Monorail is extremely unstable, risking explosion. Each shot consumes a full stabilizer. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Monorail‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Corrupted_Decei: Truth alone is the final silence; only the right path is the steadfast pursuit. Every shot consumes two bullets. When modded, all bullets are enchanted, inflicting Corrupted Blood that deals ongoing damage and 90% extra on hit. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Rifle Ammo‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Corrupted_Aphel: Light and darkness are but two ends of a bygone order; only the void remains eternal. Fires a triple laser beam. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Corrupted Aphelion Energy Core‖end‖.
Energy once pure now utterly tainted. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Corrupted Aphelion‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Minus_K: Cirno provided ultra-low-temperature ice to the alchemy lab and received this exquisite weapon in return. It fires ice crystals that effectively harm flesh. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Extinguish Crystal‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Minus_K_Ammo: Quenching and extinguishing bring even the hottest object into frozen winter. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Flame Extinguish‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Stagnant_Comet: Inspired by a phenomenon Yukari Yakumo once caused by twisting boundaries—a comet frozen in stillness—Europa engineers built this restless weapon. Power slightly increases while stationary. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Stagnant Gap‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Stagnant_Comet_: Laser barrages drawn from the gap, refracted by the Stagnant Comet into two dangerous beams. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Stagnant Comet‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Metamorphosis: A weapon Alice once left in a magical realm, recreated from memory on Europa. Each shot carries transformative power, warping living beings. Single-use. Killing with Metamorphosis greatly restores doll energy. Consumes its own durability over time while generating ammo.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Blood_Crown: A crown whose danger is obvious at a glance.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Feather_Wings: After Tenshi Hinanawi told stories of the sky to Europa, admirers crafted this fine weapon inspired by feathers and fur. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Woven Feather Sigil‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Feather_Wings_A: A finely made badge woven with fibers to resemble feathers; though not elegant, it carries perfect sentiment. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Feather Wings‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Leaves_Thorns: After Sanae blessed Europa, craftsmen forged this weapon in thanks. Deals up to 100% more damage to high-HP targets but 100% less to targets under 30% HP. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Leaf Sigil‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Leaves_Thorns_A: A small pentagram-shaped leaf sigil of immense power. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Leaf Thorns‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Lightsmithing: Every flame has fuel; alchemical fire is no exception. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Lightforged Glass‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Lightsmithing_A: Appearing like a rough amber gem, it glows with alchemical flame and immense energy. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Lightforging‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Night_Watcher: The Eternal Sun once sought to grant humanity eternity, but failed. Some believe it still silently watches the dying. Deals 50% extra damage to targets under 25% HP. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Paradox of the Watcher‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Night_Watcher_A: A charred black corundum tablet carved with intricate hieroglyphs. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Night Watcher‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Meniscate_Refle: A weapon crafted from the mysterious arts recorded in the Book of Sunset. Its strikes weaken healing and shorten buff durations.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_External_Medici: A hot-selling first-aid box from Eientei’s Europa branch. Quickly heals burns, stops bleeding, and treats infections.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_External_Within: A new pill from Eientei’s Europa branch that replaces conventional treatment. Provides fast initial healing followed by lasting gentle recovery. Effects don’t stack with multiple doses.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Sakuya_Knife_Lu: Rumored to be Sakuya’s custom launcher from the Lunar War, more portable and powerful than traditional methods. Dual-sided firing slots allow two knives at once. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Cooling Knife Energy Core‖end‖.
The power source for the Cooling Knives, enabling Sakuya to continuously fire high-energy blades. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Lunar War Cooldown Knives‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Closed_Third_Ey: A manifestation of Koishi’s sealed heart, shaped as a closed eye. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Ember of Love‖end‖.
A fragment of Koishi’s unconscious heart. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Closed Third Eye‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Bear_Doll_Bag: If it were just an ordinary teddy bear, it would have been crushed long ago. Patchouli personally sewed this doll to protect Flandre and ease her activities on Europa.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Knightmare_Shot: Developed in the alchemy lab after analyzing magical materials. Originally meant to protect humans beneath the icy ocean, it has now become a weapon of illicit violence. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖three Knightmare Shotgun Batteries or shotgun shells‖end‖.
Replacing scattered, inconvenient shells, this battery fires equally deadly beams. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Knightmare Shotgun‖end‖.
A more lethal battery, excellent against dangerous creatures beneath the ice. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Knightmare Shotgun‖end‖.
An experimental battery with untested stability but tremendous power. ‖color:gui.yellow‖Cannot be recharged‖end‖. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Knightmare Shotgun‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Knightmare_Subm: Another alchemy lab creation. Favored by magicians for its superb performance. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖two Knightmare SMG Batteries or SMG magazines‖end‖.
Replaces loose ammunition with a battery that fires deadly beams. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Knightmare Submachine Gun‖end‖.
Highly lethal, excellent against under-ice predators. ‖color:gui.yellow‖Cannot be recharged‖end‖. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Knightmare Submachine Gun‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Knightmare_Expe: The last weapon developed by the alchemy lab’s former leader. Uses magic circuits to bind two toxic materials, making it deadly to all creatures and extra effective against targets with Radiation Sickness or severe acid burns. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖two Knightmare Experimental Rifle Batteries‖end‖.
Radioactive energy source constrained by magic circuits, extremely dangerous. ‖color:gui.yellow‖Cannot be recharged‖end‖. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Knightmare Experimental Rifle‖end‖.
Corrosive energy source constrained by magic circuits, extremely dangerous. ‖color:gui.yellow‖Cannot be recharged‖end‖. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Knightmare Experimental Rifle‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Mind_Star_Mine: A lunar relic widely used after the pseudo-lunar war, with formidable destructive power. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Blunderbuss or Mercy‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Lunatic_Blass: A highly dangerous lunar relic bullet, often banned even during the pseudo-lunar war. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Blunderbuss or Mercy‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Knightmare_Gren: An extremely dangerous grenade weapon strictly banned on Europa. Difficult to operate without training and hard to achieve its full fire rate. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Knightmare Grenade Battery or grenades‖end‖.
Specialized battery for the Knightmare Grenade Launcher, clandestinely produced and unrechargeable. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Knightmare Grenade Launcher‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Grenade_Pistol: A compact yet powerful mini grenade launcher—nightmare for both enemies and user. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖grenades‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Pollution_Magician_Clo: Once a novice’s robe, now corrupted by unclean magic.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Bubble_Gun: A uniquely structured sprayer that fires high-speed foam. A favorite defense weapon for residents. Underwater it draws components from seawater, reducing bubble-can usage. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Bubble Canister‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Bubble_Gun_Ammo: A can of synthetic bubbles for high-speed foam firing. Keep out of children’s reach. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Bubble Sprayer‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Starkiller: Born in a world where the few survivors struggled against harsh environments and cruel mutations, this twisted weapon emerged unseen. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Starkiller Energy Core‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Starkiller_Ammo: An intensely penetrating energy force of formidable power. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Starkiller‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Starkiller_Gren: Said to be its former name. A modified projectile for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Starkiller‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Dissolution: An ominous weapon of unimaginable destructive power that drains the user’s life with every shot. ‖color:gui.yellow‖Cannot be recharged‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Onmyo_Ball: For disobedient youkai, a good lesson with a Yin-Yang Orb works wonders.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Mass_Shotgun: A mysterious shotgun firing special rounds that split into multiple pellets mid-flight. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Sealed Unknown Shotgun Magazine‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Mass_Shotgun_Am: A specially sealed shotgun magazine, seemingly a failed product of the Knightmare experiments. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Unknown Shotgun‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Spiritual_Water: A device designed for gathering spiritual water, far more efficient than manual collection but consuming considerable power (right-click + E to install).
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Chocolate_Cleav: A knife crafted from chocolate through special processing. Keep out of children’s reach to prevent accidental eating.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Cyclone_Electro: To combat stronger Europa creatures, Aya collaborated with kappa to create this formidable electromagnetic weapon. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Cyclone EM Ammo or “Illusion Gale”‖end‖.
Highly penetrating energy of remarkable power. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Cyclone Electromagnetic Gun‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Flandre_Destroy: A weapon crafted in attempts to analyze Flandre’s destructive power, now ironically one of her toys. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Destruction Gem‖end‖.
A gem containing terrifying destructive power, refracting three rays of light. Once displayed as a decoration by Flandre. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Destroyer‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Disintegration_: A gem of both destruction and restoration, used at the ritual table to break items back into alchemical by-products or Aether Layer Metal.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Night_Dance: A weapon created from attempts to analyze Remilia’s fate manipulation, now part of her collection. Builds an energy bar (shown as durability) that boosts power when full. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Mist of the Night‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Night_Dance_Amm: A sculpture imbued with mysterious fate energy, its power halved by imperfect processing. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Dance of the Night‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Record_Scar: A uniquely designed weapon combining music records and firearms, beloved by some magicians but fragile and requiring careful handling. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Standard or Refined Record Magazine‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Record_Scar_Amm: A plain, understated record magazine. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Record Scar‖end‖.
A magazine with more dynamic music content and greater capacity. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Record Scar‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Spectral_Core_I: A mysterious core within a ghostly body, brimming with unknown magic energy and potential as a new power source.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Magic_Plant_Fue: A disposable fuel rod made from plants and magic potions—a more economical option.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Spectral_Core_F: A durable disposable fuel rod derived from spectral energy.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Hyouibana_Armor:
A top-tier fusion of magic and technology using far-advanced techniques. 
Can only activate magatama effects in full possession state. 
Consumes Fuel Rod (Magic Plant or Spectral) during use, or some functions are lost. 
Contains 4 magatama slots; each effect is overridden: Serene: Provides illumination, +50% water current resistance Hard: -15% ranged spread, +10% melee attack speed Soft: +30% resistance to poison, paralysis, infected wounds; allows full-speed dragging of creatures Warm: +20% burn resistance Boiling: +25% melee damage, +10% projectile damage Cold: +20 max health, +50% hypoxia resistance when unconscious White: +20% stun resistance, grants invigorating effect per hit (up to 300/600) Black: +10% skill levels, +10% physical And burn resistance Smooth: Complete water-pressure protection, +20% underwater propulsion speed

A top-tier fusion of magic and technology using far-advanced techniques, currently in a basic form with room for upgrades. \nConsumes Fuel Rod (Magic Plant or Spectral) during use, or some functions are lost. \nContains 1 magatama slot; each effect is overridden: (Same magatama effects as above)

A top-tier fusion of magic and technology using far-advanced techniques, with room for further refinement. \nConsumes Fuel Rod (Magic Plant or Spectral) during use, or some functions are lost. \nContains 2 magatama slots; each effect is overridden: (Same magatama effects as above)
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Blessings_Sunfl: Seeing former Earth plants on Europa is rare. Moved by this, an unknown artisan modified kappa technology to create this weapon. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Sunflower Culture Fluid‖end‖.
A slightly heavy nutrient fluid that activates the weapon to fire energy lances. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Blessing of Sunflowers‖end‖.
A warm nutrient fluid that powers the weapon to fire energy beams. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Blessing of Sunflowers‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Moriya_Bag: To better spread faith, Sanae crafted this waist bag together with local craftsmen. Lightweight and unassuming, it also possesses talismanic properties. Autoinjector activates at 70% health threshold. Requires ‖color:gui.yellow‖battery‖end‖ to activate: When the wearer has any Miracle effect, damage taken is reduced by 10%. If worn together with a talisman, the effect is further enhanced.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Spectral_Ore01: Ore visible only through ghostly energy, can be dismantled into various minerals.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Pokect_Spectral: A new mining device powered by ghost energy and designed by the kappa. The portable version balances efficiency and mobility, making it popular for safe mining, though it remains power-hungry (right-click + E to install).
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Noh_Performance: A fan used by Hata no Kokoro for Noh performances, scattering fireworks around. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Flame of Joy‖end‖.
A flame imbued with the feeling of joy, bound within a common energy sphere for control. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Noh Performance Fan‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Dark_Noh_Doll_D: A prop for performing Noh in darkness. While Qin Kawakatsu is credited with creating Noh, its exact origins remain a mystery—perhaps Dark Noh represents an unrecorded style. When used by Kokoro with a primary emotion, grants extra bonuses.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Enhanced_Crysta: The unstable energy within increases barrage damage but also friendly fire risk. Insert into the ‖color:gui.yellow‖flashlight‖end‖ or ‖color:gui.yellow‖crystal‖end‖ slot of a magic weapon.
The faint energy reduces projectile spread and grants burn resistance. Insert into the ‖color:gui.yellow‖flashlight‖end‖ or ‖color:gui.yellow‖crystal‖end‖ slot of a magic weapon.

Dark surging energy reduces projectile spread, increases attack damage and stun resistance, but greatly limits mobility and shortens buff duration. Insert into the ‖color:gui.yellow‖flashlight‖end‖ or ‖color:gui.yellow‖crystal‖end‖ slot of a magic weapon.
infotexts.entityname.Touhou_Spell_Card_Charge_Box_: Portable Spell Card Charger (EM Gun + Rapid Cannon)
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Spell_Card_Char: Made by Reimu to promote the Spell Card Rules on Europa, this portable charger replenishes spell cards for electromagnetic guns and rapid cannons (excluding Moon and Red spell types).
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Kappa_Sniper_Ca: The kappa’s essential weapon, devastating to Europa’s native lifeforms. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Sniper Cannon Energy Cell‖end‖.
A compact but immensely powerful energy cell for the ‖color:gui.yellow‖Kappa Sniper Cannon‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Plant_Extract: Magical material processed and extracted from plants; the most basic substance.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Whisper_Half_Ph: Designed by Youmu for dual-sword combat, this weapon fires close-range barrages with excellent suppression and is easy to use one-handed. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖SMG-type ammo, Nether Magazine Plus, Whisper Magazine, or Phantom Shadow Magazine‖end‖.
A compact magazine for Half-Phantom Whisper, easy to carry. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Half-Phantom Whisper‖end‖.
A magazine for Half-Phantom Whisper, its inner energy glimmers faintly. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Half-Phantom Whisper‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Tengu_Katana: A silver katana adorned with wolf fangs, sharper and heavier than a standard guard sword.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Tengu_Special_T: A rifle used by tengu during dangerous expeditions. After alchemical lab upgrades, it became Momiji’s frequent companion. Indoors, its damage is further increased. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Assault Rifle Magazine, White Wolf Assault Magazine, or White Wolf Totem Magazine‖end‖.
A powerful close-range magazine that easily pierces the armor of Europa’s natives. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖White Wolf Special Task Assault Rifle‖end‖.
A magazine infused with totemic power for greater destructive force. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖White Wolf Special Task Assault Rifle‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Quality_Super_U: A single-use tool that upgrades any weapon’s quality by two levels.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Special_Weapon_: A book whose unsettling words explain how to craft the Fire-Stealer weapon. Reading it unlocks the ritual table recipe for the Fire-Stealer.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Komainu_Blaze: To thank Aunn for scouting and protection, an unknown master artisan in the shelter forged this weapon, merging the divine might and fire of shrine guardian lions, symbolizing protection and judgment. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Lion’s Flame‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Komainu_Blaze_A: Embodiment of the Aunn lion, breathing protective and destructive flames. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Komainu Blaze‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Prayer_Wind_Bra: Carefully sewn by Sanae, this bracer embeds serpent and frog sigils to gather the miracle power of the wind god. Raising an arm releases a blast of wind, serving as both protective charm and weapon. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Wind Prayer Core‖end‖.
A core channeling the miracle power of the wind god, unleashing gusts with a mere gesture. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Bracer of Prayer Wind‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Lunar_Phantasm: Forged from lunar science and illusory power, its energy bar glows an eerie pink. Its blueprint was once stolen to modify another high-power weapon. Can equip ‖color:gui.yellow‖Moonshadow Mirage‖end‖. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Blunderbuss ammo, Mercy Magazine, and Moonshadow Mirage‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Lunar_Phantasm_: Forged of illusory force to pierce the enemy’s mind. Each shot feels like a mental tremor, throwing foes into confusion and fear. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Lunar Phantasm‖end‖.
A dedicated attachment for the Lunar Phantasm, offering high precision and extended sight. Attachment for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Lunar Phantasm‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Weapon_Holder: A display stand specially made for showcasing magic weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Blast_Gun_Ammo: A weapon that fires high-explosive rounds. Its inner workings have been forcibly altered and engraved with incomplete, irreversible magic circuits. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Blast Gun Magazine‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Weapon_Holder: Explosive energy is bound inside this small magazine, extremely dangerous. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Blast Gun‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_TSM_Twilight: A blueprint backed by the Miracle Sea and refined in the Alchemy Lab, giving it magical properties while remaining compatible with the weapon’s original design. Has a chance to add **Dream Fade** on barrage attacks. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖original weapon ammo or Twilight-Heart Magazine‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_TSM_Twilight_Am: A Miracle-Sea-backed alchemical creation with barrage properties, still compatible with the weapon’s original design. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Twilight – Modified, Corrupted Twilight, or Miracle Sea weapons‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_TSM_Corrupted_T: Legend says this weapon was born at dusk as the world began to collapse. Fallen stardust fused with withered roots, uniting life and decay. When modified, deals greater armor-piercing damage, overall damage, and debuffs as the target’s remaining HP decreases. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖original weapon ammo, Twilight-Heart Magazine, or Corrupted Twilight-Heart Magazine‖end‖
A magazine tainted by invisible arts, extremely dangerous. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Corrupted Twilight‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_TSM_AWM: A blueprint from Kyushu Arsenal, alchemically enhanced to grant magical traits while keeping the original weapon design. Consumes double ammo. Barrage attacks deal more damage to targets with over 80% HP. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖original ammo or AWM Mind Magazine‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_TSM_AWM_Ammo: A Miracle-Sea alchemical creation with barrage properties, compatible with the original design. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖AWM – Modified, Corrupted AWM, or any rifle using 8.6×70 magazines‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_TSM_Corrupted_A: This weapon is said to arise from a long-forgotten calamity. Metal entwined with fungal threads, its cold steel merged with invasive life. Barrage attacks deal extra damage to targets below full health. When modified, hits greatly weaken enemy resistances. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Corrupted AWM Mind Magazine‖end‖
A magazine corrupted by unseen magic, extremely dangerous. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖original weapons, AWM – Modified, or Corrupted AWM‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_TSM_AA12: A Kyushu Arsenal blueprint, magically refined while keeping the original design. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖original ammo, AA12 Mind Magazine, or AA12 Elemental Magazine‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_TSM_AA12_Ammo01: A Miracle-Sea alchemical creation with barrage traits, compatible with the original design. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖AA12 – Modified or original AA12 weapons‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_TSM_AA12_Ammo02: A Miracle-Sea alchemical creation with barrage traits, compatible with the original design. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖AA12 – Modified or original AA12 weapons‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_TSM_Corrupted_A: Once a silent but ferocious metal beast, it has been reborn in the pulsing abyss. Wielders hear whispers echoing through its chamber, luring more lives to oblivion. Barrage attacks may pierce additional armor. When modified, every barrage shot adds electric shock and deep tissue damage. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖original ammo, AA12 Mind Magazine, AA12 Elemental Magazine, or Corrupted AA12 Magazine‖end‖
A magazine corrupted by invisible magic, extremely dangerous. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Corrupted AA12‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Arcane_Rune_Can: Seven-color gems slowly rotate around a magic ring, converging into a beam powerful enough to tear through ocean currents. Said to be Patchouli Knowledge’s “final formula” to suppress the many creatures of Europa. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Arcane Rune Core‖end‖
A condensed arcane crystal brimming with elemental energy. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Arcane Rune Cannon‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Petal_Tempest: Forged by a friendly magic artisan, this dual-wielded magical shotgun blooms under the guidance of flowers and spring breezes. It is more than a weapon—it’s an overture that brings a touch of spring warmth to the icy sea. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Petal Tempest Magazine‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Petal_Tempest_A: A beautifully decorated energy magazine made for Petal Tempest, infused with the magic of spring. Each reload releases a fragrant breeze. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Petal Tempest‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Bloom_Herald: A splendid magic rifle of pure white and gold, like Lily White’s own trumpet of spring. It can repel dangerous Europa creatures and release a petal mist that heals the wounds of all living beings. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Springheart Core‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Bloom_Herald_Am: A magical core infused with early-spring sunlight and the essence of blooming fields, sealing seasonal life force within. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Bloom Herald‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Stars_Stripes_A: A compact weapon that embodies disorder and freedom. Every shot bursts like fireworks, carrying chaotic energy that rattles enemy sanity and turns the battlefield into a carnival. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Chaotic Comet‖end‖
Special ammunition that seals red–blue chaotic energy. Ammunition for the ‖color:gui.yellow‖Stars and Stripes Anarchy Cannon‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Spectral_Core_B: At its heart is a ceaselessly turning spectral core, sealed within to deliver long-lasting, steady power.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Boundary_Rift_C: A weapon kept for Yukari Yakumo’s emergencies, capable of rapidly unleashing bidirectional barrages in a short window. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Boundary Pivot Core‖end‖
A miniature singularity bound by golden rings; its spinning violet vortex looks like an eye that never closes. Ammunition for the ‖color:gui.yellow‖Boundary Rift Cannon‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Unidentified_Ph: A product born from solidifying Nue Houjuu’s tricolor false signals into a weapon; its high-frequency emissions require substantial power to maintain. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Unidentified Signal Core‖end‖

The core jumps among the red/green/blue bands in a non-linear rhythm, with output logged as any one of heat, electrostatic, or oscillation. Ammunition for the ‖color:gui.yellow‖Unidentified Phenomena Emitter‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Maskwheel_Reson: Hata no Kokoro has brought her stage to the abyss—her masks speak shifting hearts, and the barrages are but projections of emotion. Fired barrages may randomly apply one of four resistance-reducing effects. Against enemies afflicted with each effect, additional outcomes are triggered: Dream Fading: extra minor burn Ancient Sorrow and Terror: extra damage Endless Nightmare: extra armor penetration Weakness: additional weakening effect Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Emotion Core‖end‖

A blue-green heart-shaped crystal core framed in antique bronze, pulsing with a gentle glow like the center of a stage, yet within it binds countless emotions. Ammunition for the ‖color:gui.yellow‖Emotional Resonance Rifle‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Superconducting: An electromagnetic machine gun driven by the instantaneous discharge of superconducting coils. Unleashes ultra-high-energy barrages using Tidal Batteries. When fired, there is a chance to launch an overloaded barrage, causing greater destruction and a wide-area explosion. Creatures caught in the blast are slowed, and barrage attacks from this weapon gain additional armor penetration. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Tidal Battery‖end‖

A high-discharge battery custom-made by Kappa Works; sealed contacts and status indicators ensure stable output even in the abyss. Ammunition for the ‖color:gui.yellow‖Tidal Superconducting Electromagnetic Gun‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Boundary_Purifi: A shotgun-style artifact powered by barrier arts. Its barrages weaken the enemy’s offensive capability. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Yin-Yang Spirit Core‖end‖
A core encapsulated by a biphasic spirit-pressure phase-stabilization ring. Ammunition for the ‖color:gui.yellow‖Boundary Purifier‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Whispering_Flow: A lightweight floral scythe woven from spring spirits and vines. Each swing scatters fine petals and a warm breeze: struck enemies are briefly slowed, and consecutive hits emit area damage.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Errata_Lanthorn: A lantern Akyuu uses to “proofread errors.” Contains slots for small tools. When lit, it also provides illumination to the wearer. When worn by Akyuu, it further boosts physical strength and grants extra health.
A magic-infused wick that emits light and heat in Europa’s deep seas. Ammunition for the ‖color:gui.yellow‖Errata Lanthorn‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Lunacy_Phosphor: A shoulder-fired phosphor projector said to have been picked up by Clownpiece. Equipped with a pressure gauge and safety valve to keep output steady, delivering extremely strong barrage firepower. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Phosphor Pressure Canister‖end‖
A heavy, pressure-rated reagent canister that provides powerful fire support for the Lunacy Phosphor. Ammunition for the ‖color:gui.yellow‖Lunacy Phosphor Torch‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Sun_Dart_Phase_: An optical marksman rifle refined by the Kappa for Sunny, driven by a refractive prism. Capable of precise shots in the lightless abyss. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Sun-Dart Phase Rune‖end‖

A replaceable energy core encapsulating a solar rune, delivering high-peak pulses to the Sun-Dart Phase Gun. The first shot has exceptional penetration. Ammunition for the ‖color:gui.yellow‖Sun-Dart Phase Gun‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Silent_Moon_Cha: A returning blade forged with Moon-Silence arts by the Kappa for Luna. It silently slices through the bio-armor of dangerous abyssal creatures.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Astrolite_Split: An optical rifle refined by the Kappa for Star, driven by a prism beam-splitting cavity and an astrolabe calibration optic. Can continuously emit powerful pulse lasers. The closer Starlight Energy (weapon durability display) is to 50%, the stronger the weapon performs. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Sun-Dart Phase Rune‖end‖
A hexagonal phase crystal core encapsulating starlight energy, providing high-frequency pulse output for the Astrolite Split-Caster. Ammunition for the ‖color:gui.yellow‖Sun-Dart Phase Gun‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_TidalInk_Rail_C: The Kappa crafted this sealed weapon for Akyuu in thanks for her reputational support on the Kappa satellite of Europa. Centered on levitating ink and twin “book-spine” guide rails, it stretches phase ink into an ink-line along the rails at the moment of firing, accelerating it and unleashing ultra-high-speed arcs. When used by Akyuu, onboard nanobots safeguard her body, reducing incoming armor penetration. Inserting different books grants different additional effects: “Symposium of Post-mysticism”: extra armor penetration “Perfect Memento in Strict Sense”: extra damage “Abyssal Gensokyo Compendium”: adds extra Burn and Shock “Grimoire”: adds extra Dream Lost Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Tidal Ink Surge Nexus‖end‖

A power core encapsulating phase ink and a phase-stabilization coil, with a built-in tidal resonance module, delivering high-peak pulses to the “Tidal Ink-Line Rail Caster.” Ammunition for the ‖color:gui.yellow‖Tidal Ink-Line Rail Caster‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Bone_Claw: It was not forged — it was *grown*. The osseous blade stretches through the whispers of decay and blood, as if it still remembers the breath and pain of its former host. Each shot devours the wielder’s blood, amplifying its own strength. The lower the user’s health, the greater the weapon’s damage. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Bone Claw Crystal‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Bone_Claw_Ammo: A grotesque magazine crafted from the bones of an unknown creature. Capable of tearing through flesh with ease. Used as ammunition for the ‖color:gui.yellow‖Bone Claw‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Acid_Fang: It was not forged by iron and fire, but conceived through venom and agony. The barrel still carries a creature’s warmth, glimmering with a viscous blue light. Each shot corrodes the wielder’s blood, enhancing its penetration. The lower the user’s health, the greater its armor-piercing power. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Acid Fang Crystal‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Acid_Fang_Ammo: A corrosive fluid supply unit crafted solely for the “Acid Fang.” The liquid inside is highly reactive, capable of causing extreme corrosion and dissolution. Used as ammunition for the ‖color:gui.yellow‖Acid Fang‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Mage_Slayer: The Mage Slayer is not merely a weapon — it is the embodiment of a creed: the rejection of magic and arrogance, and the pursuit of absolute order and lucid law. For such clarity, much may be forsaken — even one’s own eyes. Deals increased damage to targets with strong magical affinity. All beings tainted by magic suffer additional harm. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Magebreaker Core‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Mage_Slayer_Amm: This is not a source of power — it is a tomb for magic. Said to have been born from a failed ritual experiment, the “Hexbane Core” no longer provides energy, but instead unravels and consumes all things touched by sorcery. Used as ammunition for the ‖color:gui.yellow‖Mage Slayer‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Special_Weapon_: The unsettling text within the book reveals to you the secret items that the Coalition has been studying in secret. After reading, it unlocks the recipes for the Coalition's secret items.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Bottle_Element: A bottle filled with chaotic matter composed of various elements, serving as a crucial raw material. It is usually obtained when refining other elements (such as refining Wood Element at an alchemy table).
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Potion_Blending: Seeds synthesized from special potions, capable of producing four common Europan crops. Due to their fragile nature, they must be cultivated inside a Magical Material Growing Cabinet. If powered by a Phantom Battery, they will also produce mutated fruits.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Glass_Railgun: Uses special shells primarily based on silicon, combined with plant materials and crafted through ritual magic. Cheap and reliable.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Experimental_Ch: A special backpack produced by the alchemy laboratory, providing slots that automatically recharge magical weapons without manual operation. After placing the ammunition used by magical weapons into the special slots, the backpack will consume its own energy to automatically replenish the weapon’s ammo. Once the backpack’s charging function is enabled, it will recharge the backpack itself. Charging the backpack requires ‖color:gui.yellow‖three Magical Weapon Charging Crates‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Mental_Image_De: The Mental Image Deconstructor analyzes the target’s unconscious action simulations, disrupting decision pathways and causing attacks to warp, hesitate, or even turn against themselves. Targets hit by this weapon receive delayed damage; repeated hits refresh the delay. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Runic Flintlock Rounds, Mental Interference Rounds, or Hand Cannon Ammunition‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Mental_Image_Bu: A traditional projectile. When cognition fails, some problems must still be solved in the most primitive way. Serves as ammunition for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Mental Image Deconstructor‖end‖.

A specialized projectile that replaces part of its gunpowder structure with runes and psychic medium. “Damage is not always lethal.” Illusions rarely are. Serves as ammunition for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Mental Image Deconstructor‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Lost_Storage_Ba: It seems to contain someone’s personal collection. Perhaps it should be opened to take a look.
Basic supplies sealed with simple magic. They can be dismantled into materials using a deconstructor.
Basic supplies sealed with simple magic. They can be dismantled into materials using a deconstructor.
Basic supplies sealed with simple magic. They can be dismantled into materials using a deconstructor.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Subconscious_De: A device crafted from special metals harvested on Europa. Komeiji Satori can use it to recall and reconstruct magic weapons of the same tier that other characters have previously wielded. It can only be recharged once every 5 minutes.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Incredible_Head: A completely invisible headpiece, concealed by unfathomable magic. It leaves the wearer’s original appearance entirely unaffected.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Glass_Katana: A longsword forged from magically reinforced glass. It is especially effective against unarmored enemies.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Depth_Charge_Sh: A deployable floating turret developed by the Kappa. It can be deployed 3 seconds after release. The turret remains active for 200 seconds, but its firepower gradually decreases over time. Must be used with a Depth Charge Launcher.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Savior: Archive ID: Σ-10. Legend tells that when corruption eroded the heart of the world, the stars chose to fall upon themselves, forging this gun from their burning embers. Harder to be stunned while aiming. After enabling modification, barrage projectiles will ignite targets and have a chance to explode. Weapon modification energy is displayed through the remaining durability; modification can only be used when the energy is fully charged. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Star of Salvation‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Savior_Ammo: Compressed stellar core fragments, with the energy yield of a single shot roughly equivalent to a small nova eruption. Ammunition for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Savior‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Corrupted_Savio: Archive ID: Σ-10C. The concept of salvation from the void is the result of flawed logic. The void is salvation, life is corruption, and we are the cure for the suffering. The higher the modification energy, the faster the weapon fires. After enabling modification, ammunition consumption is reduced while barrage damage is greatly increased and can penetrate more armor. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Corrupted Star of Salvation‖end‖

A product of the Star of Salvation soaked in void energy. The projectile surface is covered with obsidian-like crystals, releasing unreal distortions upon firing that may cause minor spatial rifts. Ammunition for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Corrupted Savior‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Corrupted_Rifle: Forged from pure base metals using forbidden techniques, it has lost its original metallic properties and gained entirely new penetration strength. Ammunition for ‖color:gui.yellow‖weapons that use rifle ammunition‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Anguish: True to its name, this weapon is the perfect embodiment of anguish. Microscopic barbs constantly remind you of this weapon's nature when held, but when you witness how it precisely injects anguish into every cell, you'll find that slight prick in your palm is but a fair price. Deals higher damage to enemies with lower remaining health Shotgun shooting consumes all pellets at once. Use ‖color:gui.yellow‖Anguish Pellets or Hand Cannon Bullets‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Anguish_Bullet: Each round is a concentrated seed of anguish, crystallized from the nerve endings of the tormented. Ammo for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Anguish‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Carrot_Pendant: A finely crafted carrot-shaped pendant. Rabbits wearing it appear noticeably more energetic. Occupies the headset slot.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_External_Quick_: A mysterious pill said to possess extremely rapid healing effects. However, rumors claim that a batch of counterfeit medicine has recently mixed into circulation.
A mysterious pill said to possess extremely rapid healing effects. However, rumors claim that a batch of counterfeit medicine has recently mixed into circulation.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Custom_Made_Rep: A specially made repair tool that combines the functions of a wrench and a screwdriver, but is relatively fragile.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Lucky_Four_Leaf: A hair accessory symbolizing good fortune. Wearers clearly report that their minds feel sharper and more focused.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Rabbit_Waist_Po: A small rabbit-shaped waist pouch. Rabbits equipped with it appear noticeably more lively and energetic.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Lunar_Probabili: An experimental Lunar weapon that attempts to “correct hit probability”. The probability correction module embedded within the weapon recalculates the outcome before every shot, but the calculation basis, reference data, and final conclusion are never disclosed to the user. In theory, it can turn impossible hits into reality; in practice, it merely redistributes “bad luck” onto someone even less fortunate. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Probability Magazine‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Carrot_Long_Han: A temporarily assembled polearm blade. Enhanced through Tewi Inaba’s special craftsmanship and minor modifications using Lunar Capital technology, it possesses considerable lethality.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Deviation_Erasu: No one knows where Tewi Inaba obtained this weapon. Perhaps she simply happened to encounter someone extremely unlucky. After striking the same target three times consecutively, the weapon’s projectiles deal additional damage. While firing, it also has a chance to grant the user a random buff. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Deviation Core Fragment‖end‖
An energy magazine assembled from capacitor core fragments. Serves as ammunition for the ‖color:gui.yellow‖Deviation Erasure Rifle‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Nightfall:
Its surface pulses beneath your palm, as if something unseen were sliding underneath — licking — merely tasting — your flesh. Each time your fingers brush the back of your neck, a numb shiver spreads. If nightmares could be held in one’s hands, you are certain this is what they would feel like.
When modification energy is full, weapon damage multiplier increases and accuracy improves. After activating modification, damage multiplier and accuracy return to normal. Grants increased stun resistance, reduces ammunition consumption, makes the user harder to detect by enemies, and restores the wielder’s health when attacking.
Weapon modification energy is displayed through remaining durability. Modification can only be activated when energy is fully charged.
Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Dusk Terror‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Nightfall_Ammo: Imagined shadows, half-heard whispers in the dark, tremors crawling through the blood… Nightmares are often like this. As ammunition for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Nightfall‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_HouraiEmbers_Fi: An archaic repeating gun that packs “fire” into machinery. It doesn’t rely on matchcord or flint to ignite, but on a repeatedly compressed fireseed capacitor—each pull of the trigger is a controlled discharge. Uses ‖color:gui.yellow‖Fireseed Capacitor‖end‖.

A glass capacitor cartridge sealed with brass bands, with embers inside slowly swirling like a liquid. It doesn’t “burn”—it just keeps searching for an outlet, and the muzzle is its favorite one. Used as ammunition for ‖color:gui.yellow‖Duskfall‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Elements_Book_T: A temporary weapon created by the Subconscious Decoder. It will vanish once its durability is depleted.
infotexts.entitydescription.Five_Elements_Alchemic: An energy filler consumed by temporary weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Concentrated_En: A temporary weapon created by the Subconscious Decoder. It will vanish once its durability is depleted.
infotexts.entitydescription.Lightning_Kanameishi_T: An energy filler consumed by temporary weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Cyber_Homing_Am: A temporary weapon created by the Subconscious Decoder. It will vanish once its durability is depleted.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Crimson_Moonlig: A temporary weapon created by the Subconscious Decoder. It will vanish once its durability is depleted.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Nue_Midnight_Te: A temporary weapon created by the Subconscious Decoder. It will vanish once its durability is depleted.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Frozen_Frog_Tem: A temporary weapon created by the Subconscious Decoder. It will vanish once its durability is depleted.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Perfect_Snowfla: An energy filler consumed by temporary weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Love_Maze_Tempo: A temporary weapon created by the Subconscious Decoder. It will vanish once its durability is depleted.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Koishi_Knife_Te: A temporary weapon created by the Subconscious Decoder. It will vanish once its durability is depleted.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Gohei_Reimu_Tem: A temporary weapon created by the Subconscious Decoder. It will vanish once its durability is depleted.
infotexts.entityname.Touhou_Alice_Magic_Book_Tempo: ‖color:245,179,188,255‖Temporary Weapon – Grimoire of the Land of Magic‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Alice_Magic_Boo: A temporary weapon created by the Subconscious Decoder. It will vanish once its durability is depleted.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Sakuya_Knife_Et: A temporary weapon created by the Subconscious Decoder. It will vanish once its durability is depleted.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Moriya_Shrine_S: A temporary weapon created by the Subconscious Decoder. It will vanish once its durability is depleted.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Yukari_Folding_: A temporary weapon created by the Subconscious Decoder. It will vanish once its durability is depleted.
An energy filler consumed by temporary weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Veterinary_Stee: A temporary weapon created by the Subconscious Decoder. It will vanish once its durability is depleted.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Maple_Leaf_Revo: A temporary weapon created by the Subconscious Decoder. It will vanish once its durability is depleted.
An energy filler consumed by temporary weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Night_Dance_Tem: A temporary weapon created by the Subconscious Decoder. It will vanish once its durability is depleted.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Night_Dance_Amm: An energy filler consumed by temporary weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Noh_Performance: A temporary weapon created by the Subconscious Decoder. It will vanish once its durability is depleted.
An energy filler consumed by temporary weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Whisper_Half_Ph: A temporary weapon created by the Subconscious Decoder. It will vanish once its durability is depleted.
An energy filler consumed by temporary weapons.
infotexts.entityname.Touhou_Prayer_Wind_Bracer_Tem: ‖color:245,179,188,255‖Temporary Weapon – Prayer of the Wind Bracer‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Prayer_Wind_Bra: A temporary weapon created by the Subconscious Decoder. It will vanish once its durability is depleted.
An energy filler consumed by temporary weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Petal_Tempest_T: A temporary weapon created by the Subconscious Decoder. It will vanish once its durability is depleted.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Petal_Tempest_A: An energy filler consumed by temporary weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Lunacy_Phosphor: A temporary weapon created by the Subconscious Decoder. It will vanish once its durability is depleted.
An energy filler consumed by temporary weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Sun_Dart_Phase_: A temporary weapon created by the Subconscious Decoder. It will vanish once its durability is depleted.
An energy filler consumed by temporary weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Silent_Moon_Cha: A temporary weapon created by the Subconscious Decoder. It will vanish once its durability is depleted.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Astrolite_Split: A temporary weapon created by the Subconscious Decoder. It will vanish once its durability is depleted.
An energy filler consumed by temporary weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Device0: One of Europa’s alchemy lab’s proudest technologies. Forms a link with an item’s original owner to grant related abilities at slight cost. ‖color:gui.yellow‖Occupies Gene Splicer slot‖end‖.
The lab’s highest technology, forming a link with an item’s original owner to grant related abilities at slight cost. ‖color:gui.yellow‖Occupies Gene Splicer slot‖end‖.
Technology beyond even Europa’s alchemy lab, linking to an item’s original owner to gain abilities at slight cost. ‖color:gui.yellow‖Occupies Gene Splicer slot‖end‖.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Item_Bo: Can be dismantled to obtain random empathy items.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Item: Insert into the Empathy Device to activate effects when worn.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Yin_Yan: Reduces damage to humans by 5% and increases damage to non-humans by 5%.
Physical damage resistance −10%, ranged attack damage +5%.\nThe orb fires talismans—what an odd mechanism…
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Preciou: 10% chance to reduce damage taken by 20% when hit.\nFor youkai, Reimu’s needles strike key points—painful yet oddly pleasant.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Tea_Cup: +5% stun inflicted, +10% blunt damage.\n“Didn’t you know? I once spent a whole period just throwing cushions.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Mini_Ha: +5% burn damage.\nHuman or youkai, everyone wants to try firing a laser—this card is extremely popular.
Skill level −10%, ranged damage +8%.\n“I used to think that, but really it just lowers the minimum attack power—still a handy card.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Tea_Cup: Damage taken −5%.\n“Someone told me this star makes you invincible, so I bought a ton on the black market… turned out to be fakes.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_The_Col: After completing all missions in a circuit, 30% chance to gain 1000 marks.\n“A midsummer serial burglar.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Vampire: Ranged damage −10%, melee damage +25%.\n“Spell cards? Ridiculous. One bite is enough to end them.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Half_Of: Skill level −10%, ranged barrages inflict minor “disruption,” melee attacks have a 30% chance to deal +10% damage.\n“Not half a Youmu—just a quarter of a half-spirit.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Spare_H: +5% attack damage when HP less than 50%.\n“A lone spare half-spirit gets shy.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Hurrica: +5% movement speed.\n“Only tengu can so boldly bend the rules.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Phoenix: −10% max HP, +15% burn resistance.\n“To an immortal life, everything is just a game.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Spell_C: Attack damage −10%, max HP +10%.\n“For magicians, preserving mana is most important, right?”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Basic_T: Max HP −20%, barrage damage +10%.\n“In a magician’s hands, it becomes truly destructive.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Essenti: The lower your HP, the less damage you take, up to −10%.\n“Defense is the best offense!”
Movement speed −30%, +10% max HP.\n“High attack and defense in one—that’s the Essential Stone.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Encoura: −5% max HP, +10% melee attack speed.\n“The power of Aunn Komano.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Guardia: −10% friendly fire damage.\n“The power of Aunn Komano.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Aesthet: Skill level −20%, attack damage +10%.\n“Danmaku is most beautiful the moment it’s destroyed—easier too.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Annoyin: −10% stun resistance. While affected by Endless Nightmare, +5% attack damage; otherwise +5% max HP.\n“You’ve seen many UFO photos, right? Yet no space war ever broke out—they just fly because they want to.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Lunatic: No mental resistance, +5% skill level.\n“The moon really is super cool!”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Torch_O: Continuously inflicts burn, +10% attack speed.\n“You can’t feel calm while watching her torch.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Ice_Fai: +25% ranged spread, +9% ranged damage.\n“For an ice fairy, this is the ultimate proof of strength.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Pebble_: Physical resistance −15%, attack damage +10%.\n“No one notices me? Great, that makes things easier.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Shangha: When doll energy >50%, max HP +10%.\n“It seems self-aware from its motions, but surely dolls have no will… right?”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Lively_: Attack damage −5%, max HP +5%.\n“Bullet hell?! Enemies come from all directions—you’ll die if you don’t attack everywhere!”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Crazy_S: Attack damage −5%, stun resistance +10%.\n“Danmaku games are tough, especially when everyone leaves their backs unguarded.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Tranqui: Attack damage −5%, debuff resistance +10%.\n“No worries. I’ll keep attacking steadily.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Maid_Kn: −5% max HP, −10% shooting spread.\n“You’re not a true maid until you can aim and pierce a fairy.”
−5% max HP, +5% non-human damage.\n“It’s great when shots become flashy—the fancier the attack, the better.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_The_Mis: After completing all missions in a circuit, 10% chance to gain Simple Parts.\n“If kappa can stretch their arms, surely they use that to grab everything.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_The_Dil: Experience gained from circuits −15%, money gained +5%.\n“Someone’s pulling the strings behind all this. I’ll destroy it completely.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Frog_Am: Attack damage −5%, physical resistance +5%.\n“It’s said carrying this amulet ensures a safe trip home.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Snake_S: Movement speed −10%, ranged damage +5%.\n“It’s said wearing this amulet brings robust health.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Boundar: Stun resistance −5%, skill level +5%.\n“Many are intrigued by its fame—this card enjoys high popularity.”
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Empathy_Season_: Physical damage resistance decreased by 5%, maximum health increased by 5%\nShe is a carrier of items, carrying spell cards or fragments of life
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Reimu: Swimming speed +40%, walking speed +10%, skill gain rate +50%.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Marisa: Higher resistance and faster recovery from burns and acid burns; attack damage +5%.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Mokou: Burn damage +5%; recovers faster from physical damage and burns.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Remilia: Resistance to alien infection; recovers faster from blood loss.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Nitori: Swimming speed +20%. With Mechanical and Electrical Engineering >60, slowly regenerate health while underwater.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Patchouli: Swimming speed +25%, skill gain rate +25%, buffs last longer on self.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Tenshi: Higher resistance and faster recovery from Aether Stripping; max HP +10%.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Momizi: Higher resistance to bites; max HP +10%.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Yuka: Higher resistance to poison and bleeding; melee damage +20%.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Aunn: Higher resistance to spiritual pressure and insanity; attack damage +5%; friendly fire damage −10%.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Flandre: Faster recovery from bleeding; +5% armor penetration against enemies below 50% HP.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Nue: Higher resistance to debuffs; Nue outfit effects remain active when HP is below half.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Piece: Higher burn resistance; when not afflicted by insanity, +5% attack damage and attack speed.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Cirno: Slowly regenerates health in water; freeze damage +10%.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Koishi: Melee damage +10%; +10% damage to enemies affected by Strange Call; damage taken −10% when HP less than 40%.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Alice: Swimming speed +10%, skill gain rate +40%, buff duration +10%.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Sunny: Harder for monsters to spot; magical ranged attacks have 5% chance to inflict minor burn; burn damage +5%.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Luna: Harder for monsters to detect by sound; stun resistance +5%; magical ranged attacks have 5% chance to inflict minor stun; stun damage +10%.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Star: If not attacked for a long time, reduces damage taken by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ and increases health regeneration.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Sakuya: Immune to Moon God Clock effects; throwing knife damage +15%.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Sanae: When under any Miracle effect, damage taken −10%; otherwise max HP +10%.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Reisen: Slightly higher resistance to insanity; damage from insane enemies −10%.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Merry: If average crew HP >60%, damage taken −10%.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Lilywhite: Slowly restores oxygen. When HP falls below 30%, reduces incoming damage by 10%.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Satori: All attacks inflict the everlasting Endless Nightmare slumber.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Tewi: Movement speed increased by 10%. Gain 15% resistance to Reiki Disorder.
